history.content: imo 61C+188 is the right way to go. 61c and 186 have heavy project workloads like you pointed out and will be quite time-consuming. The gains on time you have to refine your applications and send more of them will do you better over recruiting season than 186 experience.

imo 61C+188 is the right way to go. 61c and 186 have heavy project workloads like you pointed out and will be quite time-consuming. The gains on time you have to refine your applications and send more of them will do you better over recruiting season than 186.

<md>What should I take between CS61C + CS186 and CS61C + CS188? 

On one hand, I want to take 186 as soon as possible, because I think it would be helpful for my industry applications generally. On the other hand, I'm worried about taking 186 with 61C because 186 is a very project-heavy class. 

And I will also be spending a significant time recruiting. And I kinda also wanted to take 188 with Prof. Dragan, because I've heard she's really nice with teaching 188.

What would you guys recommend?  My primary concern is time, because I will be spending a lot of it recruiting next semester.</md>
history.subject: CS61C + CS186 vs CS61C + CS188?
